maqras.text: Omo wa, anata ga yakan no hotondo 3-bun'no 2, mata (arutokiha) 2-bun'no 1, matawa 3-bun'no 1 o,(reihai ni) tatsu koto o shitte ora reru. Mata anata to ichi Moro ni iru ichidan no mono mo doyodearu. Arra wa, yoru to hiru o dato ni hakara reru. Kare wa anata gataga sore o hakarenai koto o shiri, anata gata o itsukushima reru. Dakara anata gata wa, kuruan o muri ni naranai teido ni yome. Kare wa, anata gata no naka yameru mono no aru koto o shitte ora reru. Mata aru mono wa arra no onkei o motomete, chijo o tabi shi, aru mono wa arra no michi no tame ni tatakatte iru (koto o). Dakara sore o muri ni naranai teido ni yome. Reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o nashi, arra ni rippana kashi tsuke (shinko no tame no sanzai) o shi nasai. Anata gataga, jibun no tamashi no tame ni arakajime okonau, don'na yoi koto mo, arra no omoto de sore o miidasou. Sono (zenko no) hosho wa, saizen ni shite saidaidearu. Anata gata wa arra no o yurushi o koi motomeruga i. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
(Dai i ni) tsutsumiru mono yo
tachinobotte keikoku shi nasai
Anata no omo o tatae nasai
Mata anata no i o seiketsu ni tamochi nasai
Fujo o sake nasai
Mikaeri o kitai shite hodokoshite wa naranai
Anata no omo no (michi no) tame ni, taeshinobi nasai
Rappa ga fuka reru toki
sonohi wa kunan no hi
Fushin-sha-tachi ni tori, yasuragi no nai (Ni~Tsudearu)
Ware ga tsukutta mono o, ware hitori ni makase nasai
Ware wa, kare ni yutakana tomi o sazuke
mata sono mawari ni, musuko-tachi o habera se
kare no tame ni,(monogoto o) enman yoi ni shita
Sore demo kare wa, ware ga sarani yutaka ni suru yo hosshita
Danjite yurusa renai. Kare wa, waga shirushi ni taishi ganmeideatta
Yagate ware wa, hidoi tsuku de kare o nayamasudearou
Kare wa so o neri, sakubo shita
Kare wa horobirudearou. Nanto (akui o motte) kare-ra wa sakubo shita koto yo
Kasanete iu. Kare wa horobirudearou. Nanto kare wa sakubo shita koto yo
Sonotoki, kare wa chiratto (kuruan o) nagame
Mayu o hisome, nigai kao o shite
sorekara, koman ni se o mukete satta
Kare wa itta. `Kore wa mukashi kara no majutsu ni sugimasen
Do mite mo ningen no kotoba ni sugimasen
Yagate ware wa jigoku no hi de, kare o yakudearou
Jigoku no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Sore wa nanimono mo manukare sasezu, mata nanimono mo nokosanai
Hito no hifu o, kuroku kogasu
Sono-jo ni wa 19 (no tenshi ga kanshuru)

Ware ga goka no kanshu to shite, tenshi-tachi no soto ni dare mo meijinakatta. Mata kare-ra no kazu o gentei shita koto wa, fushinjin no mono-tachi ni taisuru hitotsu no kokoromi ni suginai. (Sore ni yori) keiten o sadzuke rareta-sha-tachi o kakushin sa se, mata shinjiru mono no shinko o fukameru tamedearu. Mata keiten o sadzuke rareta mono ya shinja-tachi ga, utagai o nokosazu, mata sono kokoro ni yamai no yadoru mono ya, fushin-sha-tachi ni,`arra wa kono hiyu de, nani o o nozomi ni naru nodeshou ka.' To iwa seru tamedearu. Ko no yo ni arra wa, o jibun no nozomi no mono o mayowa se, mata nozomi no mono o michibika reru. Soshite kare no soto dare mo anata no omo no gunzei o shiranai nodearu. Hontoni kore wa ningen ni taisuru kunkai nihokanaranai
Iya, tsuki ni chikai kete
dokou to suru, yoru ni chikai kete
mata kagayakou to suru, akatsuki ni chikai kete (chikau)
Sore wa okina (shirushi no) hitotsudeari
ningen e no keikoku
Anata gata no naka, mae ni susumu koto o nozomu mono, mata ato ni nokoru koto o negau mono e no (keikokudearu)
Sorezore no tamashi wa, sono okonatta koto ni taishi,(arra ni) tanpo o teikyo shite iru
Migite no nakama wa betsudearu
(Kare-ra wa) rakuen no naka ni ite, tagaini tazune audearou
Tsumi o okashita-sha-tachi ni tsuite
nani ga, anata gata o rekka no naka ni michibiita nodesu ka.' To
Kare-ra wa (kotaete) iu. `Watashi-tachi wa reihai o sasagete imasendeshita
Watashi-tachi wa mata, hinja o yashinaimasendeshita
Watashi-tachi wa kuron no to to tomoni muda-banashi ni fukeri
tsuneni shinpan no hi o hitei shite imashita
Tsuini shinjitsu ga, watashi-tachi ni torai shimashita
Sore de torinasu mono no torinashi mo, kare-ra ni yakudatanaidearou
一体訓戒 Kara somuki saru to wa, kare-ra wa do shita nodearou
Kare-ra wa chodo shishi o mite kyofu ni ochitta roba no yo ni
ichimokusan ni nigedasu ka no yodeatta
Iya, kare-ra wa sorezore aka reta shokan ga sadzuke rareru koto o nozonde iru
Iya danjite sode wanai. Kare-ra wa raise o osorete inai nodearu
Iya, kore wa masani kunkaidearu
Dakara dare demo hossuru mono ni wa, sore o kimo ni meiji sase nasai
Daga, arra ga nozoma reru mono no soto wa, ryui shinaidearou. Kare wa kashiko rubeki okata yoku yurushite kudasa reru okatadearu
